name: @product-creator/state-server
description: MCP server for Multi-Agent Product Creator state management

scripts.test: npm run test:state && npm run test:context && npm run test:parallel && npm run test:enforcement && npm run test:context-engineering
scripts.test:state: node test/e2e-agent-simulation.cjs && node test/e2e-mcp-protocol.cjs && node test/e2e-edge-cases.cjs
scripts.test:context-engineering: node test/unit-context-engineering.cjs && node test/integration-context-engineering.cjs && node test/e2e-context-engineering-workflow.cjs
scripts.test:context: node test/unit-parser.cjs && node test/unit-chunker.cjs && node test/integration-context-tools.cjs && node test/e2e-context-workflow.cjs
scripts.test:parallel: node test/unit-parallel-assessment.cjs && node test/integration-parallel-assessment.cjs && node test/e2e-parallel-assessment.cjs
scripts.test:enforcement: node test/unit-communication-enforcement.cjs && node test/unit-gate-enforcement.cjs && node test/integration-enforcement.cjs && node test/e2e-enforcement-workflow.cjs
